unnormalised: **Home Loan Bonanza: Diwali Cheer for Aspiring Homeowners!**
normalised: home loan bonanza: diwali cheer for aspiring homeowners!

unnormalised: Hey there, future homeowners! Diwali’s just around the corner, and banks are showering us with home loan offers sweeter than Mysore Pak!
normalised: hey there, future homeowners! diwali’s just around the corner, and banks are showering us with home loan offers sweeter than mysore pak!

unnormalised: SBI, HDFC, and ICICI Bank are all vying for your business with schemes offering interest rates starting as low as 8.5% p.a. Some are even waiving processing fees – imagine the savings!
normalised: S B I, H D F C, and I C I C I bank are all vying for your business with schemes offering interest rates starting as low as eight point five percent per annum. some are even waiving processing fees – imagine the savings!

unnormalised: Thinking of buying that 2BHK in Powai or a villa on the outskirts of Bangalore? Now might be the time.
normalised: thinking of buying that two B H K in powai or a villa on the outskirts of bangalore? now might be the time.

unnormalised: Experts are saying the RBI might hold steady on the repo rate soon, so locking in a good deal now could save you Rs. lakhs over the long run.
normalised: experts are saying the R B I might hold steady on the repo rate soon, so locking in a good deal now could save you rupees lakhs over the long run.

unnormalised: Don't forget to shop around and compare offers. Check for hidden charges, okay? A good CIBIL score is your best friend here!
normalised: don't forget to shop around and compare offers. check for hidden charges, okay? a good C I B I L score is your best friend here!

unnormalised: Planning to celebrate Onam in your own new home next year? Start your home loan journey today! Remember that EMI calculator!
normalised: planning to celebrate onam in your own new home next year? start your home loan journey today! remember that E M I calculator!

unnormalised: And don't forget to factor in those pesky property taxes. Happy house hunting!
normalised: and don't forget to factor in those pesky property taxes. happy house hunting!
